title: What happened to all the BUGS?! 🐞 🐜 🪲 🐝 🦋
description:
As the planet changes, are things that used to be "normal" just disappearing?🤔 This is an excerpt from my 2018 interview with the incomparable Robert Krulwich, former co-host of Radiolab and science storyteller extraordinaire. It really made me think. Hope it makes you think too
